metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29156 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
drivers/infiniband/ulp/rtrs/rtrs-clt.c in the Linux kernel before 5.16.12has a double free related to rtrs_clt_dev_release.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-lowlatency - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-snapdragon - 5.4.0-9.12
No subscription required

linux-image-5.13.0-41-generic - 5.13.0-41.46~20.04.1

criterions.comment: linux package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-9.12').
